products.title: Nike Sportswear Heritage 86
products.description: Classic and comfortable, the Nike Sportswear Heritage 86 Cap features a 6-panel design made from cotton twill fabric and an adjustable closure for a snug, secure fit.

products.title: Nike Sportswear Pro Swoosh
products.description: The Nike Sportswear Pro Swoosh Classic Hat flashes a large Swoosh design trademark up front in a contrast-coloured design, and lets you adjust the fit in the back.

products.title: Nike Dri-FIT Giannis Heritage86
products.description: Fans who love Giannis for his incredible game can't get enough of his freaky signature style. The Giannis Heritage86 'Freak' Cap puts the sensational Swoosh front and centre. It's made from durable twill with an unstructured crown and a pre-curved bill.

products.title: Jordan Flight Essentials Classic99
products.description: Keep your game and style in check. Complete your 'fit and rep Jordan Brand with this versatile, classic cap.

products.title: Jordan Classic99 Flight
products.description: Go anywhere, do anything in this adjustable hat. Made from breathable cotton, it features the classic Jumpman and Flight logos atop a pre-curved bill.

products.title: Nike Sportswear Classic 99
products.description: Updating the classic silhouette, the Nike Sportswear Classic 99 Trucker features our classic graphic embroidered on the front panel and an adjustable snapback closure.

products.title: Nike Sportswear Legacy 91
products.description: The Nike Sportswear Legacy 91 is a 6-panel strapback made from durable cotton canvas fabric and a curved brim for a clean, utility look.

products.title: Jordan Pro Jumpman
products.description: Show them your hops in the Jordan Pro Jumpman Snapback Hat. It has a flat bill and high structured crown made from tightly woven twill. The iconic logo is thickly embroidered on the front, a bold projection of the Brand's heritage. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

products.title: Nike Boonie
products.description: The Nike Boonie Bucket Hat has you covered with a 360-degree brim and a drawcord that cinches down for a stay-put fit when you're on the move.Sweat-wicking power and built-in vents team up to help keep your head dry and cool.Camo print creates a commanding look.

products.title: Jordan Jumpman
products.description: Top off your outfit with a look that begs for some sunshine.The Jordan Jumpman Bucket Hat is made from lightweight woven twill that's been washed for a vintage look.

products.title: Nike Sportswear
products.description: A washed fabric on the crown of the Nike Sportswear Bucket Hat gives it a soft, well-worn feel.Its unstructured crown and brim offer a laidback look and added coverage from the elements.

products.title: Zion
products.description: Rock one of Zion's favourite styles in the Zion Bucket Hat from Jordan Brand.Made from stretchy woven fabric, it has a toggled drawcord and stitched-down loops all around above the brim.

products.title: Nike Boonie
